title: Kerbal Space Program
creator: Squad
summary: A physics-accurate rocketry sandbox about exploding your way to competence.
blurb: The beloved orbital-mechanics toybox: build, fail spectacularly, and finally stick the landing. The most educational fun you can have with delta-v.

title: Kerbal Space Program 2
creator: Intercept Games
summary: Sequel with colonies, interstellar travel, and prettier explosions.
blurb: Everything you love about KSP, now with long-term programs: colonies, resource chains, and eventually interstellar journeys.

title: Elite Dangerous
creator: Frontier Developments
summary: A massive galaxy to trade, explore, and fight in.
blurb: A 1:1 Milky Way playground with gorgeous vistas and deep sim DNA—perfect for chill exploration or high-stakes dogfights.

title: No Man’s Sky
creator: Hello Games
summary: Procedural galaxies with bases, quests, and cozy exploration.
blurb: From comeback story to comfort game—NMS now brims with co-op adventures, creative building, and serene star-hopping.

title: Surviving Mars
creator: Haemimont Games
summary: Colony sim: domes, drones, and scarcity on the Red Planet.
blurb: A crisp management puzzle where every resource has a cost—and dust storms have opinions. Super satisfying once the pipes all connect.

title: Terraformers
creator: Asteroid Lab
summary: Turn-based strategy about making Mars habitable.
blurb: A thoughtful, optimistic Mars builder where you sculpt climate as much as cities. Great for chill planners.

title: Per Aspera
creator: Tlön Industries
summary: You are the AI tasked with terraforming Mars itself.
blurb: Narrative-driven colony building that asks ethical questions about automation, control, and purpose.

title: Stellaris
creator: Paradox Development Studio
summary: Grand strategy among the stars with empires, ethics, and eldritch space horrors.
blurb: The ultimate ‘what if our species did X’ simulator—rich stories emerge from your policy choices.

title: Outer Wilds
creator: Mobius Digital
summary: A perfect time-loop mystery about curiosity and endings.
blurb: One of the best space stories ever told—no combat, just wonder and the joy of understanding.

title: Universe Sandbox
creator: Giant Army
summary: A physics playground for gravity, collisions, and climate.
blurb: Make planets, smash planets, heat planets—then call it science. A mesmerizing lab for the cosmic tinkerer.
